body: I really like the art style
I wish I was the guy, especially the end bit

Sexuality is spectrum. You're either attracted feminine qualities, masculine qualities, both, and/or a combination of them.

If you're sexually aroused by this, but not sexually aroused if it were two masculine manly looking men, then that means you're most likely straight or bi. But everything isn't black and white, it's a big grey area. Just like what you like and forget about labels. But if you're insecure about it, there are a ton of studies that suggest it's manly straight men and women of all orientations that enjoy this. Most straight men wouldn't openly admit it because of the stigma. The ones who lash out in the comments are very insecure and likely need therapy.

Don't feel "bad" for liking something.

PRO-TIP:  You are what you hate. 
Some gay guys don't like anal at all.  Lots of straight couples enjoy anal both of the guy fucking and girl fucking variety.  Its true than buttsex is more often a part of the gay repertoire than straight statistically, but to automatically infer gayness is a mistake that is largely made by men who are afraid that they might be gay.
 FYI, in the USA being gay is A-OK. :)  In Africa and Muslim nations, it can get you killed or thrown in jail.  In Russia, I hear a harsh beating is your most likely punishment for being discovered.  In Italy, it depends on if you are a Catholic priest or not, and if it results in a scandal or not. (Their legal code actually stipulates that, according to wikipedia.)
